title: How To Find New Leaders & Get Your Watchlist Ready For An Uptrend
description: When a correction takes hold, investors may be reluctant to sell some of their big winners even though they’re taking hard hits. Investor’s Business Daily deputy markets editor David Saito-Chung and Alissa Coram, IBD’s multimedia content editor, discuss why you shouldn’t hold beaten-down leaders of the past and how to find emerging market leadership. Plus, they’ll review how to get your watchlist ready for the next uptrend.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
